You've got to focus on what you can control rather than all the negative stuff around it.

“The best thing about canoeing is also the inconsistency. Canoeing is an adrenaline-filled sport. It's so inconsistent but that's what makes it exciting and that's what makes the races exciting as well. It's fun to see other people deal with other situations that you can't really control.
